response.original_title: ผีโป๊สะดือพูดและสิวของนุกนิก
response.overview: Alone in her room, 20-year-old Nuknik wallows in her frustrations with her divorced parents and a failed relationship with her boyfriend. She attempts to commit suicide, but gets distracted by a large pimple on her nose. Being obsessed with how others view her, the discovery of her pimple sets Nuknik on a journey into the imperfections of the world and herself, where she battles with the core of her existence.  With slight horror elements, this experimental film is a mirror for the modern viewer to recognise our restless state of anxiety, the constant preoccupation with our self image, and the vicious cycle of being caught up in our self-absorbed neurosis.
response.tagline: Beauty is more important than life
response.title: From a Pimple to Nirvana

titles.title: Phee poh sadue pood lae siw khong Nuk Nik
